name: 2.19 "Coach Buries a Grudge" Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 2 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What did Diane make for Sam?
questions.explanation:
sweater.

	Sam didn't want to wear the sweater because of how it made him look. Diane said no one would laugh at him, but when he put it on she started to laugh.

questions.text: What did Carla say to get the TV to work?
options: "I brought you into this bar, I'll take you out."
questions.explanation:
"Work or die."

	Carla was not known for being nice to anyone or anything. Surprisingly enough, the TV did start working again.

questions.text: Who was Coach's friend that died?
questions.explanation:
T-Bone.

	T-Bone was a friend from Coach's baseball days. Coach was supposed to give the eulogy at T-Bone's funeral.

questions.text: Where was Vera, according to Norm?
options: he doesn't know he hasn't seen her in several weeks
questions.explanation:
visiting her parents.

	Norm didn't go with his wife to see her parents. Norm did very little with his wife actually.

questions.correct: at the house, she never left
questions.explanation:
at the house, she never left.

	Norm paid such little attention to his wife that he didn't notice she was at home. She called him at Cheers and told him she was home - that was how he found out.

questions.text: Why did Sam dislike Coach's friend that died?
questions.correct: He saw him make a pass at Coach's wife.
options: He drank up all the beer last time they hung out together.
questions.explanation:
He saw him make a pass at Coach's wife.

	Sam disliked T-Bone but no one knew why. He finally told Diane what happened and unfortunately Coach overheard him.

Angela.

	Coach's wife died before the show "Cheers" ever started. He had talked about her before but this was the first time he mentioned her name.

questions.text: Who was Coach's friend that came to the bar?
questions.explanation:
Arthur.

	Arthur was played by Arthur Lessac. He lived until he was 101 and died in 2011.

questions.text: What did Coach say his dead friend was?
questions.explanation:
A son of an immigrant.

	Coach wanted to call the man an S.O.B. but couldn't bring himself to do so. He said, "Like all sons of immigrants, he was human". This showed that Coach forgave his friend. However, when the other men start talking about T-Bone he forgot he forgave him until Diane started to sing.

questions.text: What song did Diane and eventually the others start singing?
options: Blest Be the Tie That Binds
questions.explanation:
Amazing Grace.

	They men were ready to go burn the cardboard cutout of T-Bone in their anger. Diane got them to calm down by singing "Amazing Grace". "Amazing Grace" was written by John Newton.
